snippet.title: Bookbound Brigade Trailer 2019
snippet.description:
Bookbound Brigade is about beating the hell out of historical and literary characters you studied in school by leading a dream team of real and fictional heroes through a 2D side-scrolling platform-adventure. It is a new take on the established Metroidvania genre where classic stories and well-known characters get the video game treatment: its unique artistic identity and innovative brigade mechanics will challenge players with a quirky narrative and some fresh gameplay.

Coming Soon in 2019
